Monitor Your Setup
01

Customized Setup

The Hardware devices will be setup in the forst/farm/lawn/park depending on their dimensions.

02

Automated System

Dispensing of water on the process is going to be done by an automated system.

03

Harvesting Water

Excess water coming from rains is harvested automatically by vacuum water pumps.

04

Monitoring Premises

Monitor the status at your registered premises using a live dashboard of the establishment.

About Us

An IoT Project that can preserve nature for a better future

25+

Sensors used

24/7

Monitoring

100%

Waterproof

Preserve Nature aims to make devices that monitor and alert undesirable conditions in farms, forests, lawns, parks or any nature-based establishment. You can monitor your premises by logging in and viewing on your dashboard. Plus, there is Rainwater Harvesting as well as Water Dispensing based on the conditions of the premises. You may contact us here for more information.

Discover our services
Our Services

Discover What We Do & Offer To Our Clients

Smart Monitoring System

Temperature and Humidity of the atmosphere and soil are monitored and optimized by water dispensing.

Water level

Keeps a track of rain or flood, and pumps out excess water.

Prevent Fire

Water will be dispensed as soon as any rise in temperature is noticed, that will prevent aa fire before it even starts.
